data.raw:
Arrow

Left and right arrows used for navigation.
They have active and inactive states.

Styleguide arrow
data.description: Left and right arrows used for navigation. They have active and inactive states.

data.raw:
Breakpoints

Used to adapt content and design to devices.

Styleguide breakpoints
data.description: Used to adapt content and design to devices.

data.raw:
Color overlay

Applies a tint on an image. Used to make portfolio items look 'blue-ish', uniform on the Works page.
Based on [this idea](http://www.impressivewebs.com/image-tint-blend-css/).

Styleguide color-overlay
data.description: Applies a tint on an image. Used to make portfolio items look 'blue-ish', uniform on the Works page. Based on this idea.

data.raw:
Colors

The colors together with the color pairs.
Colors don't exist alone yet in pairs, like black on white.
All color pairs have a contrast ratio set for perfect readability using [Lea Verou's contrast checking tool](http://leaverou.github.io/contrast-ratio/).

Styleguide colors
data.description: The colors together with the color pairs. Colors don't exist alone yet in pairs, like black on white. All color pairs have a contrast ratio set for perfect readability using Lea Verou's contrast checking tool.

data.raw:
Description

A text block used across all pages to display text content like portfolio description, about, or more.

Styleguide description
data.description: A text block used across all pages to display text content like portfolio description, about, or more.

data.raw:
Figure

Displaying images in a responsive and retina friendly way
using the [Picturefill library](http://scottjehl.github.io/picturefill/).

Styleguide figure
data.description: Displaying images in a responsive and retina friendly way using the Picturefill library.

data.raw:
Flip

Flip effect used on links. Based on this [Codrops article](http://tympanus.net/Development/CreativeLinkEffects/).

Styleguide flip
data.description: Flip effect used on links. Based on this Codrops article.

data.raw:
Fonts

Typefaces and fonts used across the site.
They are never used directly but set up properly with the `text-style` mixin.

Styleguide fonts
data.description: Typefaces and fonts used across the site. They are never used directly but set up properly with the text-style mixin.

data.raw:
Grid

Display flexbox items in a responsive grid.
On small screens items display below each other, on larger screens in rows and columns.

Styleguide grid
data.description: Display flexbox items in a responsive grid. On small screens items display below each other, on larger screens in rows and columns.

data.raw:
Header

A simple header containing just the logo.

Styleguide header
data.description: A simple header containing just the logo.

data.raw:
Intrinsic ratio

Setting a container to a specific size defined by standard metrics like 16:9 (HD) or 4:3 and so on.
The original idea comes from [A List Apart article](http://alistapart.com/article/creating-intrinsic-ratios-for-video).

Styleguide intrinsic-ratio
data.description: Setting a container to a specific size defined by standard metrics like 16:9 (HD) or 4:3 and so on. The original idea comes from A List Apart article.

data.raw:
Link

Simple link styling. By default no underline just differentiation by style.
Links inside a long text are decorated with an underline, inactive menu items are marked with a line-through.

Styleguide link
data.description: Simple link styling. By default no underline just differentiation by style. Links inside a long text are decorated with an underline, inactive menu items are marked with a line-through.

data.raw:
Long-dash

A slightly wider dash used instead of the regular dash (—). This is one of the style marks of this site's design.

Styleguide long-dash
data.description: A slightly wider dash used instead of the regular dash (—). This is one of the style marks of this site's design.

data.raw:
Menu

The main navigation menu. The current menu item is marked with a line-through.
On mobile menu items are displayed vertical otherwise horizontal.

Styleguide menu
data.description: The main navigation menu. The current menu item is marked with a line-through. On mobile menu items are displayed vertical otherwise horizontal.

data.raw:
Paragraph

Paragraphs. Consecutive paragraphs are separated by an empty line for better readability.

Styleguide p
data.description: Paragraphs. Consecutive paragraphs are separated by an empty line for better readability.

data.raw:
Scale

Typographic grid and scale.
Different font sizes based on the [Modular Scale 4:3 Perfect Fourth](http://www.modularscale.com/?1&em&1.333&web&text) settings.

Styleguide scale
data.description: Typographic grid and scale. Different font sizes based on the Modular Scale 4:3 Perfect Fourth settings.

data.raw:
Semantic HTML5 Titles

The HTML5 structure should outline in the [HTML5 Outliner](https://gsnedders.html5.org/).
For that all content is wrapped into semnatic HTML5 elements like `<section>`, `<article>`, `<nav>` etc.
The title of these elements are necessary to display well in the Outliner but they are hidden on the UI.

Styleguide semantic-html5-titles
data.description: The HTML5 structure should outline in the HTML5 Outliner. For that all content is wrapped into semnatic HTML5 elements like <section>, <article>, <nav> etc. The title of these elements are necessary to display well in the Outliner but they are hidden on the UI.

data.raw:
Slider

A content slider based on an idea from [Google Web Fundamentals](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/look-and-feel/animations/animating-between-views).
Navigation is supported by bullets, click on image and swipe on touch-screens.

Styleguide slider.
data.description: A content slider based on an idea from Google Web Fundamentals. Navigation is supported by bullets, click on image and swipe on touch-screens.

data.raw:
Stretch

Stretching columns or rows to fill the entire viewport.

Styleguide stretch
data.description: Stretching columns or rows to fill the entire viewport.

data.raw:
Text style

Typographic settings for different text types.
Each text type has set a `font`, a `scale`, a `color` and parameters like letter-spacing, max-width or else.
Everything text uses this `text-style` mixin. We don't set `color` or `font` directly for a text.

Styleguide text-style
data.description: Typographic settings for different text types. Each text type has set a font, a scale, a color and parameters like letter-spacing, max-width or else. Everything text uses this text-style mixin. We don't set color or font directly for a text.

data.raw:
Thumb

A project thumb displayed on the Work page.

Styleguide thumb
data.description: A project thumb displayed on the Work page.

data.raw:
Title

A page or section title with an eventual subtitle separated with a `long-dash`.
It can be rotated left with 90 degrees.

Styleguide title
data.description: A page or section title with an eventual subtitle separated with a long-dash. It can be rotated left with 90 degrees.

data.raw:
Transition

Smooth animation transition using a cubic-bezier function following the recommendations from [Google Web Fundamentals](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/look-and-feel/animations/animating-between-views).
Used for all animations like the slider or hovering an element.


Styleguide transition
data.description: Smooth animation transition using a cubic-bezier function following the recommendations from Google Web Fundamentals. Used for all animations like the slider or hovering an element.

data.raw:
UL

Unordered lists.
No bullets or other decorators.

Styleguide ul
data.description: Unordered lists. No bullets or other decorators.

data.raw:
Uppercase

Uppercase text. Letters inside an uppercase text have larger letter spacing for better readability.

Styleguide uppercase
data.description: Uppercase text. Letters inside an uppercase text have larger letter spacing for better readability.
